text: L6.7. Applying Amdahl's Law Assume that a program spends its time only in ALU operations and Memory operations. You are told that an application spends 59% of its time in the memory system and takes 934 seconds to complete. What speedup will we produce if we make the ALU 2 times faster? Round your answer to two decimal digits. number (2 digits after decimal) speedup @ Save & Grade Single attempt Additional attempts available with new variants @
